text: Pamela Barrera (born 31 May 1990) is a Peruvian female volleyball player. She was part of the Peru women's national volleyball team at the 2010 FIVB Volleyball Women's World Championship in Japan. She played for Florida A&M; University. ==Clubs== * Club Sporting Cristal (2011) ==References== ==External links== *FIVB profile * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Peruvian women's volleyball players Category:Volleyball players at the 2007 Pan American Games Category:Florida A&M; Lady Rattlers volleyball players Category:Peruvian expatriates in the United States
title: Pamela Barrera
